case.title: BBW Seperated MOM (London)
case.text:
I am a 51 yr old White Seperated Mom. I have very limited time but would like to start living again. I am out of a long time marriage and my time is usually spent with my kids. Its time for mom to have me time!!!
Not looking for hook-ups or many men. Looking for one good man to spend time with maybe go to dinner, to a movie and then see where things go from their. Want a best friend, companion, someone to share things with and a lover!!!
